channel.title: Career on /dev/ by Massimiliano Pippi
channel.description: Recent content in Career on /dev/ by Massimiliano Pippi

item.title: Staff Engineer
item.description: I am a bit disappointed with this book, because compared to other titles, this is solely dedicated to the role of Staff Engineer and I was hoping it could go in depth and give more actionable suggestions. Turns out the only practical advices you can get out of it are in the first pages - it could’ve been a blog post. I wouldn’t recommend it.
